Override.entitydescription.screwdriver: Makes electrical repairs and rewiring possible. Also used to ‖color:gui.green‖tighten screws‖end‖ on a ‖color:gui.blue‖cyberlimb‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.screwdriverhardened: A screwdriver that has gone through a process of hardening using depleted fuel. The strengthened material allows for more efficient repairs and heavier swings. Also used to ‖color:gui.green‖tighten screws‖end‖ on a ‖color:gui.blue‖cyberlimb‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.screwdriverdementonite: Fabricated from the poorly understood alien material dementonite. Holding it evokes a strange sense of unease. Also used to ‖color:gui.green‖tighten screws‖end‖ on a ‖color:gui.blue‖cyberlimb‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.fpgacircuit: Field-programmable gate array—a multipurpose circuit that can be reconfigured for use in a large variety of electrical devices. Also used to replace ‖color:gui.green‖broken circuitry‖end‖ on a ‖color:gui.blue‖cyberlimb‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.weldingtool: One of the most crucial tools on board the submarine. Also works underwater, and is used to repair ‖color:gui.green‖bent metal‖end‖ on a ‖color:gui.blue‖cyberlimb‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.steel: A strong metal alloy of iron and carbon. Used in fuel rod manufacturing, as well as many military applications. Also used to replace ‖color:gui.green‖lost material‖end‖ on a ‖color:gui.blue‖cyberlimb‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.cyberarm: A powerful inorganic arm which cannot ‖color:gui.green‖bleed‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.green‖fracture‖end‖. Additionally, it will increase ‖color:gui.green‖swimming speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖melee damage‖end‖. However, it requires ‖color:gui.red‖maintenance‖end‖ and is susceptible to ‖color:gui.red‖water damage‖end‖. It can be installed after amputation.
Override.entitydescription.cyberleg: A powerful inorganic leg which cannot ‖color:gui.green‖bleed‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.green‖fracture‖end‖. Additionally, it will increase ‖color:gui.green‖running speed‖end‖. However, it requires ‖color:gui.red‖maintenance‖end‖ and is susceptible to ‖color:gui.red‖water damage‖end‖. It can be installed after amputation.
Override.entitydescription.waterproofcyberarm: A powerful inorganic arm which cannot ‖color:gui.green‖bleed‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.green‖fracture‖end‖. Additionally, it will increase ‖color:gui.green‖swimming speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖melee damage‖end‖. It requires ‖color:gui.red‖maintenance‖end‖, but is not susceptible to ‖color:gui.green‖water damage‖end‖. It can be installed after amputation.
Override.entitydescription.waterproofcyberleg: A powerful inorganic leg which cannot ‖color:gui.green‖bleed‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.green‖fracture‖end‖. Additionally, it will increase ‖color:gui.green‖running speed‖end‖. It requires ‖color:gui.red‖maintenance‖end‖, but is not susceptible to ‖color:gui.green‖water damage‖end‖. It can be installed after amputation.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberarm: This inorganic arm is impervious to biological faults, but it must be maintained to be effective. It can be brutally removed using a crowbar.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberleg: This inorganic leg is impervious to biological faults, but it must be maintained to be effective. It can be brutally removed using a crowbar.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_loosescrews: Screws have loosened as a result of physical trauma, or from other loose screws. If the screws are not tightened using a screwdriver, motion may loosen more screws.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_damagedelectro: Delicate circuitry has been damaged by water or physical trauma. If the circuits are not replaced by FPGAs, the limb may occasionally malfunction.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_bentmetal: The limb has been bent by physical trauma, making it harder to use. It can be welded back in place.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_materialloss: The limb has lost parts due to physical trauma. It can be repaired using steel. If too many parts are lost, the limb may be destroyed. Loose screws make it easier to lose parts.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_waterproof: This cyberlimb does not take water damage.
Override.entitydescription.augmentedliver: A partially synthetic human liver. Cyber-enhanced metabolism improves resistance against ‖color:gui.green‖poisons‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖negative drug effects‖end‖. It is more ‖color:gui.green‖resistant to damage‖end‖ than a biological liver.
Override.entitydescription.augmentedkidney: A partially synthetic kidney. Improves blood production and clotting, altering blood type to C+ for compatibility with other cyber implants. Use after removal of the original kidney to install.
Override.entitydescription.augmentedheart: A partially synthetic heart. Improves muscle speed and blood pressure normalization. Use after removal of the original heart to install.
Override.entitydescription.augmentedlung: A partially synthetic set of lungs. Improves muscle speed, oxygen capacity, and brief pressure resistance. Use after removal of the original lungs to install.
Override.entitydescription.augmentedbrain: A neural augment chip for the brain. Improves skills, and removes the need for analgesia in surgery. Install into the patient's existing brain.
Override.entitydescription.cyberliver: A completely synthetic liver. A top of the line blood filtration system capable of removing toxins and improving the immune system, ready for transplant.
Override.entitydescription.cyberkidney: A completely synthetic kidney. A top of the line nano-blood production system which improves blood production and clotting, altering blood type to C+ for compatibility with other cyber implants. Use after removal of original kidney to install.
Override.entitydescription.cyberheart: A completely synthetic heart. A top of the line circulatory system, improving muscle speed and blood pressure normalization. Use after removal of the original heart to install.
Override.entitydescription.cyberlung: A completely synthetic set of lungs. A top of the line respiratory system, improving muscle speed, oxygen capacity, and partial pressure resistance. Use after removal of the original lungs to install.
Override.entitydescription.cyberbrain: A positronic cyberbrain implant chipset. Top of the line, supercharges skills and removes the need for analgesia in surgery. Install into the patient's existing brain.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberlung_pres: The Cyberlung is resisting severe pressure, briefly preventing implosion.
The Cyberlung has resisted severe pressure, and is undertaking self-repair routines.
Override.entitydescription.abcpluscard: Can take blood from: all of them Can give blood to: C+
Override.entitydescription.immunosuppressantinhal: Depresses the immune system to reduce Cyberpsychosis caused by excessive cybernetic implants.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntc_cyberpsychosis: The patient is suffering from Cyberpsychosis, a mental disorder caused by excessive cybernetic implants.
The patient has resistance to Cyberpsychosis.
